person.persName: Miles Hurst, Sr. (Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah A. GoodingHurst on April 26, 1842. Father of Edward Hurst, James Hurst, Rolly Hurst, and William Hurst. Married to Mary Doyle Hurst. Father of Clayborne Hurst, John Hurst, America Hurst, Anthony Hurst, Martha Hurst, and Anna Hurst. Farmer in Fleming County in 1850 and 1860.
